name: Taylor's Roblox Theme (V2!)
description: A Roblox theme designed for players of new and old alike.
additional_info:
This is one of the oldest Roblox themes that is still up to date. V1 was developed in 2016 & 2017, however, in 2017 I started work in 2017, and finally, in 2021, V2 is now released to the public.

It is designed for maximum usability, so while it doesn't have the flashiest effects, it won't be completely white on half the pages.

You may also want to check out some excellent userscripts (install with Tampermonkey), that compliment this theme well. https://github.com/theLMGN/Tampermonkey-Scripts#roblox-scripts

(yes, i do know it says created by someone else, this site is broken to the point where you cant edit your profile or even sign up for a new account)

If you have any questions or issues, feel free to drop me a line at tayyiorrobinson@gmail.com or @TayiorRobinson on twitter.

style_setting_options.label: 2014-2019 (Source Sans)
